examples: That massage was a very sensual experience!

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the physical senses ; sensory .
examples: Plato believed that this sensual world in which we live is inferior to the heavenly realm.

definitions.definition: Provoking or exciting a strong response in the senses .

secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to the physical senses ; sensory .
Provoking or exciting a strong response in the senses .
